captypes.name: Baseball Cap
captypes.description: A casual, adjustable cap with a curved brim and structured front.

captypes.name: Fedora Cap
captypes.description: A stylish hat with a wide brim and a pinched crown, often associated with classic fashion.

captypes.name: Sun Cap
captypes.description: A lightweight hat designed with a broad brim to shield the face and neck from the sun.

captypes.name: Porkpie Cap
captypes.description: A small, round hat with a flat top and a narrow brim, offering a distinctive vintage look.

captypes.name: Beret Cap
captypes.description: A soft, round, flat-crowned hat that sits snugly on the head, often associated with artistic or military styles.

captypes.name: Sun Visor
captypes.description: A brimmed headwear with no crown, designed to shield the eyes from the sun while keeping the top of the head open.

captypes.name: Bucket Cap
captypes.description: A soft, wide-brimmed hat that offers protection from the sun and rain, with a relaxed fit.

captypes.name: Panama Cap
captypes.description: A light, breathable hat made from straw or similar materials, traditionally featuring a wide brim for sun protection.

captypes.name: Flat Cap
captypes.description: A rounded, flat-crowned hat with a small, stiff brim, known for its classic, tailored appearance.

captypes.name: Cowboy Cap
captypes.description: A wide-brimmed hat with a high, rounded crown, designed for sun protection and rugged outdoor wear.
